Please don't ask me to change this. Instead - If you are experiencing excessively

[url]http://www.softpedia.com/developer/Alexander-Vigovsky-11541.html[/url]

This is an EXCELLENT codec with a settable gain, to boost the volume
and also gives excellent surround-sound even with 2 speakers (try it with headphones!)
I have it set to play ALL my audio. Thanks, Alex!
